parameter.name: frame_offset
parameter.desc: Selected frame for each field by offset to get metadata (e.g., field, pressure, temperature)

parameter.name: old_drift_tube_length
parameter.desc: Drift tube length used by the acquisition software cm

parameter.name: neutral_mass
parameter.desc: Neutral mass of the ion mobility buffer gas

parameter.name: substring_tunemix
parameter.desc: prefix string for the tune mix sample files

parameter.name: accumulation_time
parameter.desc: long accumulation time (ms) in the SLIM-based IMS-MS

parameter.name: C
parameter.desc: C can be found within the control software of the Synapt Q-IM-o-ToF instrument and is designated as the EDC (Enhanced Duty Cycle) delay coefficient. (Ruotolo et al. 2008)
